data.name:
How Online Gaming has benefitted from the lockdown:
Positive Impact of Covid-19 and the way forward
data.summary: All about online gaming and the impact these current times have had on it
data.speakers:
Roland Landers, CEO, All India Gaming Federation (AIGF)
Manish Agarwal, CEO at Nazara Games
Paavan Nanda, CEO and Co-founder, WinZO
Parth Chadha Founder & CEO EWar Games
Varun Mahna, Founder & CEO, PokerDangal
Rajesh Raju, Managing Director, Kalaari Capital
